snippet: As the group Advertising Women of New York celebrated an anniversary, executives discussed some different ways women and men approach their work.
abstract: Advertising column notes as group Advertising Women of New York celebrates its 100th anniversary, executives discuss some different ways women and men approach their work.

byline.original: By TANZINA VEGA and STUART ELLIOTT

lead_paragraph: As the group Advertising Women of New York celebrated an anniversary, executives discussed some different ways women and men approach their work.

headline.main: Women and the Changing Face of the Industry
headline.print_headline: Women and the Changing Face of the Industry
